pages.text: One of the rawest materials needed to crate the Soul Havester; which is used to transform into the Reaper.$(li)50% chance mining this ore drops the Mini Soul.  $(li)Mininum tool: §1OP $(li)Located in: §1Dead Zone Biome$(li2)Y: §1 0 - 15. $(li2)Max vien size: §1 4.$(li2)Max viens per chunk: §1 5.
